=Bitcoin Wallet Privacy Criteria Weighting=

This document outlines the OBPP criteria rating method.

1. Each category is assigned a score representing its relative importance compared to other categories.
1. Each sub-category (quality, usability, and feedback) is assigned a score representing its relative importance compared to other sub-categories in the same category.
1. Each question is assigned a score representing its relative importance compared to other questions in the same sub-category.

The final score for each question is the product of the three percentages listed above.
